title: Tracing Integration in Lighthouse
description:
During Ethereum Protocol Fellowship, I've worked on integrating `Tracing`(an async-friendly logging framework) into Lighthouse(CL client) .
This presentation will provide a brief overview of the work that Iâ€™ve done.
